member.name: P:Kairen.RI.IsUninstallable
member.summary: Checks if the file is allowed to be uninstalled. If it has not been manually set true or false, it will default to looking at the existence of vNumberOfChildren, and further default to false.

member.name: M:Kairen.CommonLibrary.DE(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks if a Directory/Folder Exists.
member.returns: returns True if it does exist, or False if it doesn't.

member.name: M:Kairen.CommonLibrary.FE(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks if a File Exists.
member.returns: returns True if it does exist, or False if it doesn't.

member.name: M:Kairen.CommonLibrary.Right(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns characters from the right end of a string.

member.name: M:Kairen.CommonLibrary.Left(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns characters from the left end of a string.

members.member:
Display Message Using Own NotifyIcon
Displays a notification in the Task Bar Icon Tray.
The main message to convey to the user. The title of the message, which appears above the message. The text that appears when you mouseover the Icon. The icon to use. Defaults to the Default Kairen Icon. How long in milliseconds to display the notification.

member.name: M:Kairen.CommonLibrary.DisplayMessage(System.String,System.String,System.Object@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Displays a notification in the Task Bar Icon Tray.
member.param: The main message to convey to the user.
The title of the message, which appears above the message.
_NotifyIcon as object equal to the icon you want to use.
How long in milliseconds to display the notification.

member.name: M:Kairen.Form1.GetFilesRecursive(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method starts at the specified directory. It traverses all subdirectories. It returns a List of those directories.

member.name: M:Kairen.Form1.Right(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns characters from the right end of a string.

member.name: M:Kairen.Form1.Left(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns characters from the left end of a string.

member.name: M:Kairen.Launcher_v2.LoadResourceFiles(System.String)
member.summary: Custom Code Per Version, that loads each version into memory.
member.param: The Version to load As String
member.remarks: This needs updated with every launcher release, even when none of it changes.
